CustomField.description: When true, weekly estimates versus actuals are not automatically generated if you have custom time periods of a week type defined that overlap with an assignment or a held resource request. The default value is false.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When true, weekly estimates versus actuals are not automatically generated if you have custom time periods of a week type defined that overlap with an assignment or a held resource request. The default value is false.
CustomField.label: Disable Automatic Weekly Time Periods
